messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] WTB
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/6/03 1:27:43 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Yep, the theatre runs first run movies.  $4 for regular shows, $2 for matinees. Teresa
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/6/03 1:27:43 AM Eastern Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> You have The Two Towers showing at a $2 movie already!?
>

Yep, the theatre runs first run movies. $4 for regular shows, $2 for
matinees.

Teresa

messages.subject: WTB
messages.msgSnippet: Used XBOX game controller in good condition.  Reasonably priced.  :-) Seriously, thanks for all the input.  You guys were right,  Just being without the game
messages.messageBody:
Used XBOX game controller in good condition. Reasonably priced. :-)

Seriously, thanks for all the input. You guys were right, Just being
without the game today has made Ethan miserable.. He's mad at himself and
frustrated because he lost his temper. He has had to share with JP on the
Nintendo 64. I really am going to be looking for a used one in good shape..
WIsh me luck, if I dont find one tomorrow.... Then its Wal-mart, here we
come. And, next weekend's movie day will have to be foregone. OH. btw, we
go to the $2 matinee, so we dont drop a wad at the movies.. We're GREAT
bargain hunters.

Thanks again
Teresa
